notice.name: 1. TimeLine
notice.copyright: This activity will contain graphical representation of your expenditure till you reset your budget.

notice.name: 2. Reset Total Budget
notice.copyright: This input box will Reset your budget and your old expenditure will be save in the form of monthly budget .

notice.name: 3. Update Budget
notice.copyright: This input box will update your budget by adding given amount by you .

notice.name: 4. Money Exchange
notice.copyright: This will contain your lending and borrowing details.

notice.name: 5. Saving Account
notice.copyright: This will contain your saving amount (Budget~Expenditure).

notice.name: 6. Backup and Restore
notice.copyright: This will backup your data in sd card with file name pocketmoney_database.db and then you can restore it.
